column4: can anyone please help me with my i cant boot ubuntu from my external HDD
NEI: Not Enough Info. The opposite of TMI.
600ms lag here! Need help with t3h backup I'm doing. It's erroring.

I have installed ubuntu to my external (usb) HDD... I installed it from a live boot on another 4GB flash drive.  The installation on the external HDD was successful, but now the external HDD will not boot
